body:
Alright, before I start this I am gonna say my page is not that really fancy but I like it :D.
https://avicus.net/_Rilo#about 
That is my HTML work.
You can order 1 from me and I will make it :D.
Soz Sessp for stealing the backround xD.
The rest I did without any help.
Enjoy!

replies.body: A quick question...when you say this is your work, do you mean the CTRL + C part? Since, it looks alot the the code in Sessp's about page (that was made before yours). Next time you claim it's yours, think about changing it a bit more than just editing one or two things.
